# CDA-v1.0 Compliance

**Repository**: State-Inverant  
**CDA Version**: 1.0.0  
**Last Validated**: 2025-11-24  

This deterministic AI prototype adheres to CDA-v1.0 through:
- Zero-entropy outputs via Z3 oracle
- Deterministic proposal loop (no sampling)
- Immutable JSONL audit ledger
- Hamiltonian-style energy barriers
- Complete operational transparency
